title: Automate Customer Support Emails using Gmail, OpenAI GPT-3.5, and Google Sheets
author: »öugui Drago»ô

Note","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[0,0],"parameters":{"color":4,"width":2060,"height":680,"content":"---

## üìå Sticky Notes

### 1. Step 1 ‚Äì Trigger the Workflow
Starts the automation manually or on a schedule.

### 2. Step 2 ‚Äì Fetch New Emails
Uses Gmail to retrieve incoming emails with a specific label or filter.

### 3. Step 3 ‚Äì Classify Email with OpenAI
Sends the email content to GPT-3.5 to detect the category and suggested response.

### 4. Step 4 ‚Äì Generate Smart Reply
Uses OpenAI to generate a friendly, clear, and personalized email response.

### 5. Step 5 ‚Äì Send Email to Customer
Replies to the customer via Gmail with the AI-generated message.

### 6. Step 6 ‚Äì Log Interaction to Google Sheets
Logs all data including timestamp, email address, subject, category, and reply.

### 7. Step 7 ‚Äì Optional Enhancements
Add-ons like Slack notifications, translations, webhook triggers, or error handling.

---

readme:
## üîß Setup Instructions

  1. **Import** the workflow into n8n
  2. Set up credentials for: 
     * `Gmail OAuth2`
     * `Google Sheets (Service Account)`
     * `OpenAI API Key`
  3. Update the Gmail node to filter by a label or unread status
  4. Paste your Google Sheet ID in the Sheet node
  5. Review the system prompt in the OpenAI node (you can customize tone, language, or instructions)
  6. Hit "Execute Workflow" or schedule it using a cron trigger



## ‚öôÔ∏è Features

  * üì• Auto-fetch emails from Gmail (new unread threads only)
  * üß† Classifies message content using **OpenAI GPT-3.5**
  * üè∑Ô∏è Categorizes each email: _Billing_ , _Bug Report_ , _Question_ , etc.
  * üìä Logs structured data into a connected **Google Sheet**
  * ‚úâÔ∏è Sends personalized auto-replies based on category
  * ‚è±Ô∏è Includes optional wait logic to simulate human delay
  * üîÅ Easily extendable for ticket systems, CRMs, or Slack alerts



* * *

## üîß Requirements

To make this template work, you‚Äôll need:

  * ‚úÖ **n8n** account (self-hosted or cloud)
  * üîê **Google Service Account** (with Sheets API enabled)
  * üì© **Gmail** account connected via OAuth2
  * üß† **OpenAI API key** (ChatGPT 3.5 or 4.0)
  * üìë A Google Sheet with columns for: `Date`, `Email`, `Subject`, `Category`, `Reply`
  * üåê Basic knowledge of how to create credentials in n8n



* * *

## üîç What It Looks Like

### üì® Customer Emails

All incoming messages labeled `N8N-Test` are captured for analysis.

![Customer Inquiry - Emails Received](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/03ea667a-9fea-493d-9fb1-858b3664862a)

* * *

### ‚úâÔ∏è Smart AI Replies

Each customer receives a personalized response, written by OpenAI and sent through Gmail.

![Automated Response - Customer Service Reply](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/170752c8-77a5-477e-a1e2-9dfe5017f294)

![Email Sent - Customer Response](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/539dd30c-60d1-4523-a6e3-c4401c5b40b0)

* * *

### üìä Logged in Google Sheets

A full history of conversations is stored with category and tone.. ideal for analytics or reporting.

![Logged in Google Sheets](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/404ff5de-0ab3-4639-b9a5-3de33f778db7)

* * *

## üé• Watch Full Demo

‚û°Ô∏è [Click to watch the full video on Vimeo](https://vimeo.com/1070420977/417e0490c5?share=copy)

* * *

## üí° Use Case

This system is perfect for:

  * E-commerce brands handling repetitive support requests
  * Small teams who want to reduce support response time
  * Any business looking to automate customer service without losing personalization



* * *

## üîß Setup Instructions

  1. **Import** the workflow into n8n
  2. Set up credentials for: 
     * `Gmail OAuth2`
     * `Google Sheets (Service Account)`
     * `OpenAI API Key`
  3. Update the Gmail node to filter by a label or unread status
  4. Paste your Google Sheet ID in the Sheet node
  5. Review the system prompt in the OpenAI node (you can customize tone, language, or instructions)
  6. Hit "Execute Workflow" or schedule it using a cron trigger



* * *

## üõ†Ô∏è Customization Guidance

Want to adapt it to your use case?

  * Change categories in the OpenAI prompt (`Billing`, `Bug Report`, etc.)
  * Add conditional logic to forward certain categories to Slack or Discord
  * Save attachments or original email in a database
  * Translate replies into other languages using a translation node
  * Add filters based on subject or sender for more precise targeting



* * *

üí¨ Have questions? Want this workflow customized for your business?

[‚Üí Contact Me](mailto:contact@tuguidragos.com)  
[‚Üí Visit tuguidragos.com](https://tuguidragos.com)
